Smart Power Strip: A power strip that can monitor the energy usage of each device connected to it and automatically turn off devices that are not in use, helping to save energy and reduce electricity bills.
Multi-Port Charging Station: A power strip with multiple USB ports that can charge multiple devices at once, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and other portable devices.
Surge Protector: A power strip with built-in surge protection that can protect devices from power surges caused by lightning strikes or other electrical disturbances.
Power Strip with Built-in WiFi Hotspot: A power strip that can provide a WiFi hotspot for devices connected to it, allowing users to access the internet without needing a separate router.

Power Strip with Voice Control: A power strip that can be controlled using voice commands, allowing users to turn devices on and off, and monitor energy usage, all without having to physically interact with the power strip.
